column4: Hi, I'm trying to stream a divx file from stage6 though mplayer without firefox just using mplayer>open>play url.., divx files from the hdd work fine with mplayer. but when i try to steam it just freezes and i have to kill it. how do i fix this
no error on the command line?
hold on, ill check
yeah, ill pastebin the error.
this is what im getting, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/53638/
try playing the stream with... mplayer -vo xv <url>
ok :)
worked fine thanks how could i add this cmd to mplayer?
/etc/mplayer/mplayer.conf
thanks again :D
there'll likely be a commented line "vo=xv", just uncomment, or add it youself
np
hmm, strange it was already commented out under /etc/mplayer/mplayer.conf but when i load it under Multimedia>Mplayer movie player "gmplayer". Still freezes.
this is my .conf, it still crashes though http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/53640/
strange.. considering it worked from the command line
check .mplayer/config, there may be something overiding it
ok :)
otherwise, all I can suggest is doing it like that at the commandline when you want to play those streams
problem with that is it doesn't maximise or pause. I have audio sync problems with totem and vlc freezes sometimes like its buffering and doesn't start again. you know anyother divx players?
try xine or vl
vlc, rather
thanks ill try xine :) if this doesnt work
